title: Little Woman
lyrics:
Little Woman, is it me
Born to build your, suffering
Are you crazy
Just like me
To let me close, to let me be
The one

Loves a gun

Loves a gun



Pretty baby

Let me know

How to touch you

Where to go

With my fingers

With my tongue

With my anger

Loves a gun

Loves a gun



Little woman

You should know

You're the river

Shines like chrome

Love is loud

Love is long

Love is patient

Love's a song

Love's a song
